  check the domain name information about domains in .az zone

    1.Enter the name of your domain (ex.nt.az)
    2.Select your desired *ext
Do a easy search below for your desired domain name, to check for its availability before you proceed to register.
You can find info about the following domains :
az, com.az, net.az, int.az, gov.az, org.az, .edu.az, .info.az, .pp.az, .mil.az, .name.az and biz.az.


Using of domain names contains less than 3 symbols is not allowed
